lines.text: You really didn't think I'd leave... without making sure you were dead?
For the crimes against the people of Vietnam, I sentence you to death!
Don't worry! It's not real, they're just tryin' to scare ya!
They've got a lousy sense of humor!
[Braddock pushes a button, and everything explodes behind him]

[Holds up a living snake]
I'll bite its head off, for a pack of cigarettes!
You men are not prisoners of war... you are common criminals!
